refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Simple, fast sine oscillator, that uses only one multiply, and two add operations to generate one sample of output, and does not require a function table.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ares oscils iamp, icps, iphs [, iflg]

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: icps -- frequency in Hz (may be zero or negative, however the absolute value must be less than sr/2).

iflg -- sum of the following values:
2: use double precision even if Csound was compiled to use floats. This improves quality (especially in the case of long performance time), but may be up to twice as slow.
1: skip initialization.
